body.p: This year's FOSDEM is starting at the end of the week, with a Gentoo booth and a "devroom" full of presentations by Gentoo developers, reports today's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. The Qmail team is looking for input from users to help with decisions about parts to keep or drop from the Portage tree. A distribution based on Gentoo Linux has announced their fourth "Komplete" release in the UK, and the online media last week was full of praise for the first Linux to successfully boot on an Intel Mac -- Gentoo Linux! Security announcements and bugzilla statistics complete this week's GWN, enjoy reading it!
